questions.question: A machine learning engineer wants to collaborate with a team on a project in AWS SageMaker. The team needs to share notebooks, manage multiple users, and ensure that they can easily scale resources based on their deep learning model's GPU requirements. They also prefer to work in an integrated environment that allows seamless transition between data preparation, training, and model deployment. Which SageMaker tool would BEST meet these collaboration and scaling requirements?
options: AWS Lambda with integrated Jupyter notebooks
questions.topic: Deployment and Orchestration of ML Workflows
questions.Practice test: AWS Machine Learning Engineer - Associate Practice Test 1 -
